name: Absolute Swimming Free - 2016 World Tour Pool Competition Games Edition
name_original: Absolute Swimming Free - 2016 World Tour Pool Competition Games Edition
description:
** 100% FREE! EVERYTHING UNLOCKED! **
** AWESOME SWIMMING COMPETITION GAME! **

It's game time! You are a world class swimmer competing for the gold! It's just you and your "competition" that stands in the way of winning the race.

FEATURES

- Easy "tap" controls.
- Fun game play.
- Cool graphics & sounds.
